data.title: James Newton Howard The Sheffield Track Record - Rock Instrumental Tracks US Vinyl LP

The sound quality is outstanding, with Howard, responsible for many of today's finest film scores & session work for the likes of Elton John, Rickie Lee Jones & Toto, leading a rock/fusion group on keys, alongside Robbie Buchanan [who composed the two tunes on the second side], Lenny Castro, Nathan East, Mike Landau & Carlos Tracklisting & Info: Amuseum The Higher You Rise Wise To The Lines Le Ballade Year of Release - 1982 Format - vinyl LP album (LP record) Record Label - Sheffield Lab Catalogue No - LAB20 Country of Origin - USA Availability - In Stock

JAMES NEWTON HOWARD The Sheffield Track Record (Rare limited edition 1982 US Sheffield Lab Direct To Disc 4-track LP, for audio component testing & evaluation. The sound quality is outstanding, with Howard, responsible for many of today's finest film scores & session work for the likes of Elton John, Rickie Lee Jones & Toto, leading a rock/fusion group on keys, alongside Robbie Buchanan [who composed the two tunes on the second side], Lenny Castro, Nathan East, Mike Landau & CarlosVega. Housed in a pasted picture sleeve. The sleeve shows a tiny mark to the bottom edge but is otherwise in excellent condition; the vinyl looks barely played LAB20)

Le Ballade
